data.eml:eml: Three new species of Papuagrion Ris, 1913 (Odonata: Coenagrionidae) from the Hindenburg Wall region of western Papua New Guinea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Orr, A. G., Richards, S. J. (2016): Three new species of Papuagrion Ris, 1913 (Odonata: Coenagrionidae) from the Hindenburg Wall region of western Papua New Guinea. Zootaxa 4072 (3): 319-332, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4072.3.2
